entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
